name: @prosopo/protocol
description: Dev tools for working with prosopo contracts

scripts.docker: f() { if [ "$CI" = "true" ]; then FLAGS=''; else FLAGS='-it'; fi ; mkdir -p cargo-cache && docker run --rm $FLAGS -u $(id -u):$(id -g) --cpu-quota=-1 -v $PWD:/src -v $PWD/cargo-cache:/usr/local/cargo/registry prosopo/cargo-contract:4.1.1 "export RUST_BACKTRACE=1; $@" ;}; f
scripts.build:contract: f() { npm run docker -- "cd contracts/$1 && cargo contract build --release" ;}; f
scripts.build:contract:dev: f() { npm run docker -- "cd contracts/$1 && cargo contract build" ;}; f
scripts.build:crate: f() { npm run docker -- "cd crates/$1 && cargo build" ;}; f
scripts.build:contract:all:
eval $(npm --silent run ls:contracts | xargs -I {} printf 'npm run build:contract -- {}
' | sed ':a;N;$!ba;s/\n/ \&\& /g')
scripts.build:crate:all:
eval $(npm --silent run ls:crates | xargs -I {} printf 'npm run build:crate -- {}
' | sed ':a;N;$!ba;s/\n/ \&\& /g')
scripts.build:all: npm run build:crate:all && npm run build:contract:all
scripts.test:contract: f() { npm run docker -- "cd contracts/$1 && cargo test" ;}; f
scripts.test:contract:all:
eval $(npm --silent run ls:contracts | xargs -I {} printf 'npm run test:contract -- {}
' | sed ':a;N;$!ba;s/\n/ \&\& /g')
scripts.test:crate: f() { npm run docker -- "cd crates/$1 && cargo test" ;}; f
scripts.test:crate:all:
eval $(npm --silent run ls:crates | xargs -I {} printf 'npm run test:crate -- {}
' | sed ':a;N;$!ba;s/\n/ \&\& /g')
scripts.test:all: npm run test:crate:all && npm run test:contract:all
scripts.check:crates:
eval $(npm --silent run ls:crates | xargs -I {} printf 'npm run docker -- "cd crates/{} && cargo check"
' | sed ':a;N;$!ba;s/\n/ \&\& /g')
scripts.check:contracts:
eval $(npm --silent run ls:contracts | xargs -I {} printf 'npm run docker -- "cd contracts/{} && cargo check"
' | sed ':a;N;$!ba;s/\n/ \&\& /g')
scripts.check: npm run check:crates && npm run check:contracts
scripts.clean: npm run clean:target && npm run clean:cache
scripts.rustfmt:
eval $(npm --silent run ls:all | xargs -I {} printf 'npm run docker -- "cd {} && cargo fmt --all -- --check --verbose"
' | sed ':a;N;$!ba;s/\n/ \&\& /g')
scripts.clippy:
eval $(npm --silent run ls:all | xargs -I {} printf 'npm run docker -- "cd {} && cargo clippy -- -D warnings -A clippy::too_many_arguments"
' | sed ':a;N;$!ba;s/\n/ \&\& /g')
scripts.ls:crates: f() { cd crates && find . -maxdepth 1 | tr -d '.' | tr -d '/' | tail -n +2 ;}; f
scripts.ls:contracts: f() { cd contracts && find . -maxdepth 1 | tr -d '.' | tr -d '/' | tail -n +2 ;}; f
scripts.ls:all: f() { find crates contracts -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d ;}; f

author: Prosopo Limited
